creator: mark.collin@lazeryattack.com
text:
There are transitive dependency issues in the Jmeter 3.1 Maven libraries:

[WARNING] The POM for xerces:xerces-impl:jar:2.6.2 is missing, no dependency information available
Downloading: https://repo.maven.apache.org/maven2/xml-apis/xml-apis/2.6.2/xml-apis-2.6.2.pom
[WARNING] The POM for xml-apis:xml-apis:jar:2.6.2 is missing, no dependency information available
Downloading: https://repo.maven.apache.org/maven2/xerces/xerces-impl/2.6.2/xerces-impl-2.6.2.jar

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Hello Mark,
Are you sure issue is in JMeter ?
I created a blank project with 3.1 as dependency and I don't see:
- xml-apis-2.6.2
- xerces-impl-2.6.2

Neither directly nor transitively.
Do you have more details ?
Thank you

creator: mark.collin@lazeryattack.com
text:
I'm seeing:

org.apache.jmeter:ApacheJMeter:jar:3.1
—> org.apache.commons:commons-dbcp2:jar:2.1.1
——> org.apache.commons:commons-pool2:jar:2.4.2
———> cglib:cglib:jar:3.1
————> ant:ant:jar:1.6.2
—————— xerces:xerces-impl:jar:2.6.2
—————— xml-apis:xml-apis:jar:2.6.2

Let me dig into it a bit more and try and work out why I'm seeing this but you aren't.

Hi Mark,
Could you provide a test project that reproduces this issue.
I think you're probably forcing inclusion of optional dependencies.
As cglib is an optional dep of commons-pool2.

Find attached current deps of 3.1 as I see them.
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
mark.collin@lazeryattack.com
text:
Doing some more investigation, it's because I'm pulling down optional dependencies.

I just need to make sure I ignore ones that are optional, so not a problem and this can be closed.

Thanks for looking into it.
